list.title: 靜態展示
list.description: 靜態展示是一款展示靜態資訊的產品，只需要一張圖片即可上架，適合用於展示單一商品或活動。
list.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"basicData":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","default":"靜態展示_產品標題","ui":{"label":"產品標題","widget":"input","widgetConfig":{"placeholder":"請輸入產品標題"}},"rules":{"required":true,"maxLength":20}},"description":{"type":"string","default":"","ui":{"label":"產品描述","widget":"textarea","widgetConfig":{"placeholder":"請輸入產品描述(非必填)"}},"rules":{"maxLength":80}}},"ui":{"label":"基本資訊"}},"prototypeData":{"type":"object","properties":{"position":{"type":"string","default":"bottom","ui":{"label":"文案位置","widget":"select","widgetConfig":{"options":[{"label":"文案置頂","value":"top"},{"label":"文案置底","value":"bottom"}],"placeholder":"文案位置","searchable":false}},"rules":{"required":true}},"title":{"type":"string","default":"你的商品標題","ui":{"label":"商品標題","widget":"input","widgetConfig":{"placeholder":"請輸入商品標題"}},"rules":{"required":true,"maxLength":18}},"description":{"type":"string","default":"","ui":{"label":"商品描述","widget":"input","widgetConfig":{"placeholder":"請輸入商品描述(非必填)"}},"rules":{"maxLength":20}},"image":{"type":"string","default":"white.webp","ui":{"label":"商品素材","widget":"select","widgetConfig":{"options":[{"label":"白鞋","value":"white.webp"},{"label":"紅鞋","value":"red.webp"},{"label":"棕鞋","value":"brown.webp"},{"label":"象牙色鞋","value":"ivory.webp"},{"label":"黑鞋","value":"black.webp"},{"label":"米色鞋","value":"beige.webp"},{"label":"藍鞋","value":"blue.webp"},{"label":"綠鞋","value":"green.webp"},{"label":"炭灰色鞋","value":"charcoal.webp"},{"label":"黃鞋","value":"yellow.webp"},{"label":"栗色鞋","value":"maroon.webp"},{"label":"銅色鞋","value":"bronze.webp"},{"label":"紫鞋","value":"purple.webp"},{"label":"灰鞋","value":"gray.webp"},{"label":"海軍藍色鞋","value":"navy.webp"},{"label":"耳機-黑","value":"a-headphone-1.webp"},{"label":"耳機-紅","value":"a-headphone-2.webp"},{"label":"耳機-橙","value":"a-headphone-3.webp"},{"label":"耳機-綠","value":"a-headphone-4.webp"},{"label":"耳機-青","value":"a-headphone-5.webp"},{"label":"耳機-靛","value":"a-headphone-6.webp"}],"placeholder":"請 list.title: 旋轉立方
list.description: 旋轉立方是一款展示圖片的輪播產品，支援多張圖片，經典的立方旋轉效果，適合用於展示一系列商品與活動。
list.schema: list.title: 刮刮樂
list.description: 刮刮樂是一款互動抽獎產品，使用者可以刮開圖片，獲得隨機獎勵，適合用於抽獎活動或是隨機展示商品。
list.schema:
